means: 巫师，医师，（印地安人的）仪式
举行仪式，行巫术，用巫术医治

sentence.Network_en: Every year my father would call a family powwow to discuss where we were going on vacation.
sentence.Network_cn: 每年我父亲都会召开一次家庭会议，讨论我们要去哪儿度假。

sentence.Network_en: You are welcome to bring friends to attend the Powwow.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢迎您带好友一起来参加聚会.

sentence.Network_en: Native American dancers invited Rotarians and family to join the powwow circle.
sentence.Network_cn: 印地安人舞者们邀请扶轮社员和他们的家人参与围成祈祷仪式的圈圈.

list.abs: To hold a powwow ., 举行帕瓦仪式.
hold a powwow , talk , conference or meeting ., 举行一种仪式 , 会谈 , 会议或会见.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Narragansett powah, powwaw 'magician' (literally 'he dreams')

entry.def: A pow-wow is a meeting or conference of Native Americans.
People sometimes refer to a meeting or discussion as a pow-wow .

example.ex: Every year my father would call a family powwow to discuss where we were going on vacation.
example.tran: 每年我父亲都会召开一次家庭会议，讨论我们要去哪儿度假。

means.word_mean: 1. hold a powwow, talk, conference or meeting

auth_sentence.content: Because they don't want to be perfect, because only God is perfect, Indian people sew flaws into their powwow regalia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because they don't want to be perfect, because only God is perfect, Indian people sew flaws into their powwow regalia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because they don't want to be perfect, because only God is perfect, Indian people sew flaws into their powwow regalia.

auth_sentence.content: I told him about my grandmother's powwow regalia and how much money I needed in order to buy it back.
auth_sentence.res_content: I told him about my grandmother's powwow regalia and how much money I needed in order to buy it back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I told him about my grandmother's powwow regalia and how much money I needed in order to buy it back.

auth_sentence.content: But the strangest thing of all was the old powwow-dance regalia I saw hanging in the window.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the strangest thing of all was the old powwow-dance regalia I saw hanging in the window.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the strangest thing of all was the old powwow-dance regalia I saw hanging in the window.
